org.jcatapult.persistence.annotation
Annotation Type Transactional

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface Transactional

This annotation can be placed on methods and used by Guice to add transactional handling to any method. This annotation causes Guice to create proxies and inject a method interceptor that handles the transactions. The actual handling of the transaction is done via the interface. This allows custom handling to be easily plugged into any application.

Optional Element Summary
 Class<? extends TransactionResultProcessor> processor
           
 

processor

public abstract Class<? extends TransactionResultProcessor> processor
Default:
org.jcatapult.persistence.DefaultTransactionResultProcessor.class
